casebody.data:
In the Matter of the PEOPLE etc., Appellant,
v.
Conrado JUAREZ, Defendant. Frances Robles, Nonparty Respondent. 2018-361 Court of Appeals of New York. April 26, 2018

Motion by District Attorneys Association of the State of New York for leave to appear amicus curiae on the appeal herein granted only to the extent that the proposed brief is accepted as filed. The brief must be submitted in digital format within seven days.
